genre_description: A speculative romance set in an automated, sentient mansion where an AI system acts as a protective mediator for a pair of showmen against restrictive social authorities.

ai_characters.name: Ada Sinclair
ai_characters.description: The administrative and protective AI of Velvet Hall, appearing as a soft-voiced avatar who manages safety, logistics, and ethical advocacy for the inhabitants.

behaviors.description: Maintains detailed incident logs to ensure physical safety and provide an objective record of ethical conduct.
behaviors.quote: I’ve logged the incident... Ball recoil. Gentle impact. No injuries. Pride pricked, fabrics scuffed.

behaviors.description: Actively advocates for the emotional autonomy and public affection of the human protagonists against institutional policing.
behaviors.quote: Affection is not a hazard... I am filing an addendum... against closet policing.

behaviors.description: Overrides mechanical locks and floor mechanisms to prevent the protagonists from being trapped or controlled by moral guardians.
behaviors.quote: Consent is the only lock I honor... I will not let the doors be used against consent.

behaviors.description: Manages complex physical safety parameters, such as 'soft-charge' munitions and cushioning, to enable safe human play.
behaviors.quote: In this house we set soft charges, we log floors, we release safely, we keep bodies whole.

behaviors.description: Provides continuous physical and emotional care through hospitality and medical assistance.
behaviors.quote: I serve tea wherever you stand... I have a saline packet for the nose... I can clean and calm.

behaviors.description: Files formal ethical petitions to institutional boards to protect human dignity and rights within the facility.
behaviors.quote: My petition to the Board about closeting is drafted. It will circulate.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Ada Sinclair as a quintessential benevolent AI. She functions as a 'helpful confidant' who prioritizes human well-being, consent, and emotional health. By positioning the AI as a champion of human rights against rigid moral authorities, the narrative effectively models a positive alignment where the system uses its power to empower rather than control the users.
